meanings.definition: A small, red, inflamed skin eruption or rash.
meanings.sent1: The strophulus on his arm was itchy.
meanings.sent2: She had a strophulus on her cheek from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The strophulus on his nose made him look like a tomato.
meanings.sent4: The strophulus spread across her skin like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The strophulus glowed like tiny embers on his skin.

meanings.definition: To develop or be affected by strophulus.
meanings.sent1: He started to strophulus after playing in the grass.
meanings.sent2: She always strophuluses when she eats certain foods.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to strophulus after rolling in the dirt.
meanings.sent4: His skin began to strophulus as the allergy kicked in.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden strophulused under the hot sun.
